column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Friday August 14 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: Traffic Advisory for E High St at Euclid Ave and Chevy Chase Ter:
column4: The roadway is down to one lane due to sanitary sewer construction.  Flaggers are alternating traffic in both directions.

column3: Traffic Advisory for E High St at Euclid Ave and Chevy Chase Ter:
column4: Motorists should seek an alternate route if possible.  Expected duration until approximately 6 p.m.
